title: Australia: the encounter
abstract: Recounts the story of Matthew Flinder's circumnavigation around Australia.
description: Recounts the story of Matthew Flinder's circumnavigation around Australia, his trials across the Tasman, involvement with the Nagarrindjeri tribe and his encounters with a French explorer.  The Aboriginal people clash with these "white ghosts".  On his way home to England, Flinders is imprisoned in Mauritius and his prized cat, Trim is killed.  A decade later, Flinders returns home to his family.  Meanwhile, the violence upon Aboriginal sacred lands continues.  An animated short entered to "Create a Stamp Story" section of ACMI's 'Screen It' media making competition for Primary Schools.
related_objects: Collection; B1006088; Screen It 2004; Active; 01 Jan 2005-30 Apr 2005
